text: is a Japanese town in Kagawa Prefecture on the island of Shikoku.Deal, William E. (2005). Handbook to Life in Medieval and Early Modern Japan, p. 74. ==History== Kotohira grew up around the Kotohira Shrine. Kanamaru-za in Kotohira is Japan's oldest surviving Kabuki playhouse. "Kanamaruza Kabuki Theatre" at Japan-guide.com; retrieved 2013-2-24. == References == == Other websites == * Kotohira City website ; Category:Settlements in Kagawa Prefecture
title: Kotohira, Kagawa
